column4: hi folks is it normal that Gnome in Breezy semms to me a kind of slow on my ATHLON XP 2200+ and GeForce4 MX 64MB ram with nvidia7667 driver?
: we don't know about performance benching though... but it should not affect any kind of performance while using ubuntu
, that depends on what your card can do... not the driver supplied with X though
well it was slow with the default X driver so i upgraded to nvidia driver, now e.g. the 3D screensavers perform super but the 2D environment seems to me a little faster only
